TRACK MAINTENANCE
Until Nov 30*, Mon to Fri, from 10:45 PM to 5 AM each night
[SB] Free shuttle buses and M14 replace [L] trains between Broadway Junction in Brooklyn and 8 Av in Manhattan


[L] Service runs between Rockaway Pkwy and Broadway Junction.

[SB] Buses run on two routes:
1. Between Broadway Junction and Lorimer St, making all [L] stops and connecting with the [J] at Marcy Av.
2. Loop bus serving Marcy Av [J], Hewes St [J], Broadway [G], Lorimer St and Bedford Av.

Travel Alternatives
For service between Manhattan and Brooklyn, take the [A] or [J].

In Brooklyn, transfer between trains and [SB] buses at:
• Marcy Av [J]
• Myrtle-Wyckoff Avs [M]
• Broadway Junction [A] [J] | [L] (to/from Rockaway Pkwy)

In Manhattan, take the M14 for [L] stations along 14 St; transfer between trains and buses at:
• 8 Av - [A], M14
• 6 Av - [F], M14
• Delancey St/Essex St - [F] [J], M14A
